name: pre-order print: special collector's edition volume II
description: limited edition neonV is a biannual magazine for the contemporary peculiar woman. assuming an uncanny perspective, the magazine offers women a compelling storyline of traditional and innovative content by exposing the cultural and subcultural continuums in fashion, art, beauty and travel. access to print special collector's edition: neonV volume II *your pre-order includes the print limited-edition, only 50 will ever be printed, of neonV vol. II MMXIII (september 2013) pre-order sale runs: november 29, 2013-december 20, 2013 magazines are expected to ship december 30, 2013. for a glimpse of online content from volume I + II, go here + here read more: details vol. II: as the new one in print media, the neonV collective (nVc) happily ‘eased on down the road,’ and indulged in our favorite classic subjects of our generation and beyond. inspired by all things classic--film, music, culture, children’s stories, design, fashion and beauty (and the list goes on)--we are honored to highlight the work of our featured creatives, who are successfully mastering the balance of past and contemporary influences and producing gifts that we’ve grown to love. they are the new classic, and so are you. print: 142 pages [including covers], digitally-printed, perfect bound, full color on matte + uncoated paper. pin-back button included. digital: 142 pages [including covers], html5 digital magazine, so you may access it from your web browser. shipping + handling u.s. 5 | canada 7 | international 15 contact info@neonVmag.com for international s/h of three or more items *customers, and not neonV magazine, are responsible for the payment of any applicable customs duties or taxes in their own country.
